teistats_xpath_expression_added: ${user} added the XPath expression '${xpath_expr}' to the TEI statistics add-on in ${node}
teistats_xpath_expression_changed: ${user} changed the XPath expression '${xpath_expr}' of the TEI statistics add-on in ${node}
teistats_xpath_expression_removed: ${user} removed the XPath expression '${xpath_expr}' from the TEI statistics add-on in ${node}
